name: Custom WP Framework
author: Pull Clicks

sections.description:
With this plugin you can:

  1. Add, edit and delete custom post types in WordPress.
  2. View post types that have already been registered by other sources.
  3. Disable custom post types to make them inactive without being permanently deleted.
  4. Select a dashicon or upload your own image for the menu icon of your custom post types.
  5. Automatically migrate existing posts whenever the custom post type slug is updated.
  6. Assign available taxonomies to your custom post types.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Add, edit, and delete custom post types.
  • Enable/disable custom post type functionality.

short_description: Create custom post types easily from the WordPress admin dashboard. No coding knowledge required!
description:
With this plugin you can:

  1. Add, edit and delete custom post types in WordPress.
  2. View post types that have already been registered by other sources.
  3. Disable custom post types to make them inactive without being permanently deleted.
  4. Select a dashicon or upload your own image for the menu icon of your custom post types.
  5. Automatically migrate existing posts whenever the custom post type slug is updated.
  6. Assign available taxonomies to your custom post types.

screenshots.caption: Register new custom post types with our simple UI.
